Ultra Magnus nodded, "I see your point we have no right to use this as our 
battlefield but we have no choice. Theres more at stake here then the 
planet...the universe is in jeopardy. It must be fought here. I wish it 
werent so but it is."

--part1_156.178797d9.2b086918_boundary
